titles.title: To prohibit the Ambassador's Fund for Cultural Preservation from making grants, and for other purposes.
To prohibit the Ambassador's Fund for Cultural Preservation from making grants, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: Prohibits funds from being used to carry out the Ambassador's Fund for Cultural Preservation or any other program that provides grants for cultural preservation outside the United States.
